## Test

```{r}
pop <- population("~/Github/AssocMating/config.json")

test <- sim_matching(pop, iter = 100, alpha = 0.9999, progress = TRUE, eval = TRUE)

plot_eval(test)
```

```{r}
tsol <- test$sol
plot(tsol$phi1, tsol$f_phi1, xlab = expression(phi[1](m[j])), ylab = expression(phi[1](f[alpha(j)])))
abline(lm(f_phi1 ~ phi1, data = tsol), col = "red", lwd = 1.5, lty = 2)
plot(tsol$phi1, tsol$f_phi2, xlab = expression(phi[1](m[j])), ylab = expression(phi[2](f[alpha(j)])))
abline(lm(f_phi2 ~ phi1, data = tsol), col = "red", lwd = 1.5, lty = 2)
plot(tsol$X, tsol$f_X, xlab = expression(X(m[j])), ylab = expression(X(f[alpha(j)])))
abline(lm(f_X ~ X, data = tsol), col = "red", lwd = 1.5, lty = 2)
```
